resources.string:
Real-ESRGAN is a Practical Algorithms for General Image Restoration.
 This is a simple Android application that uses Realsr-NCNN, SRMD-NCNN, Real-CUGAN-NCNN, Real-ESRGAN, Waifu2x-NCNN and ImageMagicK.

The application does not collect any private information from your device. 
Github: https://github.com/tumuyan/RealSR-NCNN-Android 
CoolApk:https://www.coolapk.com/apk/292197 
 
You can run these programs: 
1.Super resolution -i input.png -o output.png 
./realsr-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png 
./srmd-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png 
./realcugan-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png


2.Classical interpolation 
./resize-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png [-m mode] [-n] [-s scale]
 -m mode（nearest/bilinear/bicubic/avir/avir-lancir）
 -n not use ncnn for nearest和bilinear
 -s scale(default=4), could be float without -n



3.ImageMagick 
./magick input.png -filter filter -resize widthxheight output.png 
./magick input.png -filter filter -resize n% output.png 
filter could be Box Cubic Hamming Jinc Lanczos Lagrange Mitchell Sinc, etc，intpu ./magick -list filter and see more filter, or visit https://legacy.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter


4.Show image/info 
 in 
 out 
 show 
 help 

5.Shell command 
ls head cp rm etc. 

 Tips. 
1. Pleas visit https://github.com/tumuyan/RealSR-NCNN-Android#how-to-use-realsr-ncnn-android-gui for more information. 
2. The App supports waifu2x, but does not include the model and preset commands. If you need to use waifu2x, please download and unzip to get the model and add waifu2x commands in the extra command, such as ./waifu2x-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png -m /sdcard/10086/models-upconv_7_photo (/sdcard/10086/models-upconv_7_photo is the path where the model you placed) 
3. You can download other esrgan models and use them yourself. https://upscale.wiki/wiki/Model_Database There are many models here, download the .pth models and convert it to ncnn models in Windows. The conversion steps are as follows: download cupscal https://github.com/n00mkrad/cupscale/releases , unzip cupscal, open CupscaleData in\pth2ncnn, use pth2ncnn.exe to convert pth files to ncnn file. Rename the models folder with a suffix of models-Real- or models-ESRGAN-, copy the folder to your phone, add add extra commands in the settings Activity and save. Command just like ./realsr-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png -m /sdcard/10086/models-Real-4x-UltraSharp (/sdcard/10086/models-Real-4x-UltraSharp is the path to the folder where you save your models)
Input console command, for example: ./realsr-ncnn -i input.png -o output.png
Default command in the command list
Load/Proc/Save thread count for default command (default=1:2:2), actually useless
Keep screen on when it works
Extra command in the command list
Error: there is no file to export
Preprocess input image (not webp/png/jpg/bmp) to png
